channel.title: Machine Learning on Greydon Gilmore
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Greydon Gilmore

item.title: Predicting Subthalamic Nucleus
item.description: Optimal targeting of the subthalamic nucleus (STN) for Parkinson disease is essential to the clinical outcome. Machine learning, using single and multi-unit spike recordings from the operating room, will be used to estimate STN boundaries and optimal electrode placement.
